## Bio

Alysse Kowalski is a postdoctoral research fellow in the Department of 
[Population, Family and Reproductive Health]("https://publichealth.jhu.edu/departments/population-family-and-reproductive-health") at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg 
School of Public Health. She is a public health nutritionist whose work focuses 
on supporting optimal maternal and child nutrition in low resource settings. In
addition to her work, she enjoys exploring by bicycle and trying to figure out
how to squeeze more plants into her garden.
